tool.title: table
tool.about:
Example of a Rappture <table> object.
Some simulators produce a list of energies, which can be stored in a <table> and displayed as discrete energy levels by Rappture. When Rappture sees a table with an energy column, it uses the built-in energy viewer.
When you click the Simulate button, the simulator will generate a series of energies for the particle in a box problem.

about.label: Box size
about.description: Size of the 1D quantum well containing an electron

about.label: Effective mass
about.description: Mass of the electron in a crystal, relative to the normal electron mass m0. The value 1 corresponds to the usual electron mass in free space (crystal has no effect on the mass).
